description: I crafted supplier logistics interfaces with a focus on inventory management, integrated user insights into product enhancements, and improved team processes through collaborative design thinking.

I led the UX design process to boost user satisfaction and built a Design System that streamlined development. As a co-founder of “App Factory,” I united research, design, product, and tech teams, while optimizing data onboarding to increase user adoption and integration speed.

I built and managed Signavio's design library for consistent, collaborative product development. I led the UX/UI redesign of the flagship product, raising user experience and visual unity, and delivered impactful prototypes and usability tests.
As the first and only designer, handled product UX/UI, brand, marketing, and event visuals, helping the company move from early demos to a coherent product and presence customers recognized.

Created visual and interface designs for global hardware and software products, leading cross-functional projects in packaging and product visuals. I worked with international teams to uphold UX excellence and ensure brand consistency across markets.
